title: Easy to handle
subtitle: You can rely on that.
content:
Easy to handle

You can rely on that.

The carbon belt drive offers a wonderfully smooth ride, at the same time being low-maintenance and reliable. Dirt and oil stains, as was the case with chain drives, are now a thing of the past. The twist shift grip and Magura hydraulic rim brakes guarantee comfortable and safe everyday cycling. And the standard Abus frame lock is just as reliable.
description: The carbon belt drive offers a wonderfully smooth ride, at the same time being low-maintenance and reliable. Dirt and oil stains, as was the case with chain drives, are now a thing of the past. The twist shift grip and Magura hydraulic rim brakes guarantee comfortable and safe everyday cycling. And the standard Abus frame lock is just as reliable.
